snippet.title: Sonic Riders X: Sonic Riders Remake!!! (SAGE 2021)
snippet.description:
This video showcases Sonic Riders X, a Sonic Riders remake in Unity. The graphics are mindblowing, and new there's welcome new changes to mechanics, such as holding the boost! So far you can play as Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles. This is from SAGE 2021.

00:00 - Menu
00:21 - Sonic + Metal City
2:43 - Tails + Splash Canyon 
6:19 - Knuckles + M&S Dream Racing
7:42 - Demo Zone
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out their SAGE Expo website here!
https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-riders-x.1073/
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
